p.b: üìã To enable barcode tracking on storage boxes:

ol.li: Navigate to existing Storage Box record
Click Generate Barcode button (if not already assigned)
System auto-creates unique barcode based on box ID or custom format
Select Barcode Type: QR Code (2D) or Code 128 (1D linear)
QR codes store more data (box ID + customer + location + contents summary)
Code 128 is simpler but only stores box ID (faster scanning)
Click Print Label to generate PDF with barcode + human-readable info
Label includes: Box ID, Customer Name, Date Created, Barcode
Affix label to multiple sides of box for omnidirectional scanning
Box now appears in Barcode Storage Box list for tracking
Use mobile scanner or warehouse app to scan box during:
‚Ä¢ Receiving: Log arrival from customer, assign location
‚Ä¢ Retrieval: Quickly locate box in warehouse by scanning shelves
‚Ä¢ Delivery: Verify correct box before sending to customer
‚Ä¢ Inventory: Rapid cycle count via barcode scanning
‚Ä¢ Destruction: Confirm identity before shredding (audit trail)

ul.li: Scan-to-Locate: Find any box in 10,000+ inventory in seconds
Error Reduction: Eliminate manual entry mistakes, wrong box retrievals
Audit Trail: Every scan logs user, timestamp, GPS location
Mobile Workflows: Field techs scan boxes on pickups/deliveries via smartphone

field.p:
üöÄ Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Dual Barcode Types: QR Code (rich data) or Code 128 (speed/simplicity)
‚Ä¢ Auto-Generation: Barcodes created on-demand with sequential or custom formats
‚Ä¢ Label Printing: Professional PDF labels with company logo, box details, barcode
‚Ä¢ Mobile Scanning: iOS/Android apps can scan via camera (no dedicated hardware needed)
‚Ä¢ Multi-Scan Support: Scan same box at pickup, receiving, storage, retrieval, delivery
‚Ä¢ History Tracking: View all scan events with timestamps, users, locations
‚Ä¢ Integration Ready: Works with warehouse management, retrieval orders, destruction tracking

üí° Pro Tips:
‚Ä¢ Use QR Codes for boxes with frequent location changes - stores more tracking data
‚Ä¢ Use Code 128 for high-volume warehouses - faster scanning throughput
‚Ä¢ Print labels on durable material (laminated or polyester) for long-term storage
‚Ä¢ Affix labels to top and sides so boxes can be scanned from any angle on shelves
‚Ä¢ Enable mobile scanning for field technicians - no extra hardware required
